title: Which of the following is a circadian rhythm?

content.question: Which of the following is a circadian rhythm?

choices.label: The ebb and flow of an individual’s emotions during a 24-hour period
Jet lag experienced after an airline flight from Los Angeles to Tokyo
A cycle of biological functioning that lasts about 25 hours
The series of five stages that people go through during a normal night’s sleep

content.answer: A cycle of biological functioning that lasts about 25 hours

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
